overview:
Renato Pessanha is a senior professional skilled in both business and technology. His experience includes IT department and projects management in industries like health care among others.

He is Certified Secure Software Lifecycle Professional (CSSLP), from the International Information Systems Security Certification Consortium, Inc. (ISC)Â²Â®. In 2005, he published a monograph on Engenharia de Software Seguro (Secure Software Engineering), a reference in Portuguese language at that time.

Besides his technical background, he also deals fine with business topics. As a functional SAP Sales and Distribution (SD), order to cash process is one of his specialties.

He was one of the first invited to test commercial Internet in Brazil back in 1995, but before that he had already been involved with it.

His educational background includes software engineering, accounting, and post-graduation in computing engineering.
